welcome_message_body: Welcome to Al Khankah, Egypt! Discover the charming city known for its rich history, beautiful mosques, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Al Khankah has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights at Cairo International Airport

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal for domestic and regional flights at Cairo International Airport

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Cairo International Airport, serving mainly international flights

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in some areas

terminals.name: Terminal 1

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
